title: ALL NEW APTS LINWOOD @ LODGE 10 min to Downtown!
posting_body: ['15395 Linwood St, Detroit, MI 48238', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Located on Floor #:', '1', 'Floors in Bldg:', '3', 'Parking Spaces:', '1', 'Pets Allowed:', 'None', 'DESCRIPTION', 'This apartment building has been lovingly restored to its original beauty.', '\xa0 All units are large and spaceous.', '\xa0 On the Lodge Freeway conveniently located 10 minutes from downtown Detroit.', '\xa0 COME SEE FOR YOURSELF!', '\xa0 Studios, 1br and 2br available.', '\xa0CALL', 'show contact info', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Stove', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'On-site Laundry', 'Security Cameras', 'Parking', 'OTHER PRICING DETAILS', 'Available Date:\xa0\xa0\xa0IMMEDIATE', 'Included Utilities:\xa0\xa0\xa0WATER', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Gene', 'show contact info', 'Brookstone Properties']
